TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ExtensionDataObject extends System.Object

summary.span: 儲存已建立版本之資料合約的資料，此資料合約已因加入新成員而得到擴充。

span.span: Stores data from a versioned data contract that has been extended by adding new members.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一種結構，它會儲存 在還原序列化 (Deserialization) 作業期間所遇到的額外資料。The is the structure that stores extra data encountered by the during deserialization operations. 序列化 (Serialization) 會使用這個結構將額外資料寫入至已序列化的執行個體。The structure is used by serialization to write the extra data into the serialized instance. 執行個體的 屬性會傳回這個結構。The structure is returned by the property of the interface. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會序列化型別 (`PersonVersion2`) 的執行個體，這個型別是可序列化型別 (`Person`) 的第二個版本。The following code serializes an instance of a type (`PersonVersion2`) that is the second version of the serializable type (`Person`). 第二個版本包含第一個版本沒有呈現的額外資料 (`ID` 欄位)。The second version contains extra data (`ID` field) that is not present in the first version. 接著，這段程式碼會將 XML 文件還原序列化為 `Person` 物件，然後立即重新序列化此包含額外資料的物件。The code then deserializes the XML document into a `Person` object, then immediately reserializes the object including the extra data. 最後，這段程式碼會將新的 XML 還原序列化為 `PersonVersion2` 物件，然後將完整資料寫入至主控台，以證明資料已完成從舊版型別開始與結束的來回流程。Finally, the code deserializes the new XML into a `PersonVersion2` object and writes the complete data to the console, proving that the data has made a round trip to and from an older version of the type. 請注意， 屬性必須套用 ，並且 屬性已設定為與原始類別相同的名稱和命名空間。Note that the attribute must be applied with the and properties set to the same name and namespace as the original class. [!code-csharp[IUnknownSerializationData#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/iunknownserializationdata/cs/iunknownserialization.cs#0)] [!code-vb[IUnknownSerializationData#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/iunknownserializationdata/vb/iunknownserialization.vb#0)]
